## Strong and Weak Acids and Bases {.build}

pKa

$HCL + H_2O_{excess} -> H^+ + Cl^- + H_2O_{excess}$ pKa = < 1

$CH_3COOH + H_2O_{excess} -> H^+ + CH_3COO^-^- + H_2O_{excess}$ pKa = 4.75

$NaOH + H_2O_{excess} -> Na^+ + OH^- + H_2O_{excess}$ pKa = 13.8

$NH_3 + H_2O_{excess} -> NH_4^+ + OH^- + H_2O_{excess}$ pKa = 9.25
